Web Developer

I’m 29 years old self-taught Web developer with advanced knowledge of HTML/CSS and solid understanding of Javascript. Currently I’m looking for a Junior web developer position where I could use and improve my skills in these and other technologies to build creative Web Site, SPA’s or even Smartphone or Desktop application’s interfaces. Please, find more about me and my experience in CV.
